lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: I have never been hungry for long. This is a small way to thank GOD.

lenders.name: Ben C
lenders.loan_because: Service is the rent we pay for the privilege of living on this earth.

lenders.name: Lawrence
lenders.loan_because: microfinancing empowers people to become active members in a community and it helps to bring entire regions out of poverty and into a sustainable future.
lenders.occupational_info: I attend the University of Denver majoring in International Studies and Ecology.

lenders.name: OBSI Staff Donation
lenders.occupational_info: Independent and impartial dispute resolution service for customers of Canada's banking and investment industries.

lenders.name: Madison
lenders.loan_because: I believe in development, and development requires empowerment. Kiva offers this to people worldwide.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student of the world first and foremost, but I am also a Graduate student at American University studying International Development focusing on how social entrepreneurship contributes to economic development.

lenders.name: Gus
lenders.loan_because: What goes around, comes around.
lenders.occupational_info: I educate people about different issues affecting their lives, and then help them to organize so that they are able to communicate effectively to the powers that be, and if the powers that be hear what they are saying then hopefully change will follow.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.whereabouts: north vancouver, British Columbia, Canad British Columbia

lenders.name: Gail
lenders.loan_because: Recently visisted Tanzania, was enchanted with the beautiful country, wonderful people and wanted to help in some way.

lenders.name: Matador
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people to better support themselves and their family

lenders.name: everett
lenders.loan_because: As an entrepreneur, I understand the importance of self-sufficiency.  It not only empowers the individual, but the community.
lenders.occupational_info: I write historical fiction.  Visit my website for more information.  I also own a real estate appraisal firm that values real estate for loans and other purposes.

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on figuring out how cancer works so that someday we'll have better ways of treating and preventing it.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: Women with skills, education, and a business change the world for the better for all.My kids have been exchange students to Panama,Chile, Sweden & Spain, and myself to Turkey so these are home too and I want to support  the women of these countries.
lenders.occupational_info: Raise and educate my kids, take care of patients, and raise Arabian horses.

lenders.name: Caitlin
lenders.loan_because: Kiva reminds me that the little I have to give can make a significant difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I study the law.

lenders.name: Lauri & Wonder
lenders.loan_because: Despite many struggles, I am fortunate that my life is less difficult than most of my fellow world citizens.  I lend because I hope others will be able to fund their security and their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I taught art and philosophy to high school students for 30 years, and then had to retire because of a physical disability.  I now have an art studio in my home where I create oil paintings for show and sale.

lenders.name: Taina
lenders.loan_because: I have more than I need.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English to 3rd and 4th graders who think I'm a rock star. Seriously. They asked.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: Can the world be made a better place one person at a time?  Let's find out...
lenders.occupational_info: I managed, and was part owner, of a company that specialized in distribution, engineering and assembly of automation systems used by semiconductor equipment manufacturers.  Now, I'm retired, playing music and riding motorcycles.

lenders.name: Wayne
lenders.occupational_info: We develop solar farms for electricity production.

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of small gestures

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I feel like I am making a difference in peoples lives and helping them be successful in supporting their families.

lenders.name: Carolyne
lenders.loan_because: This is the best way for a small amount of money to make a huge difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Community organizing.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a positive difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Day-to-day I do what I can to minimize my ecological footprint and, by example,  encourage others to take steps to improve theirs.

lenders.name: Ellen
lenders.loan_because: I think this type of small lending is wonderful.  Plus, the option to give a gift certificate presents a great opportunity to spread the joy of giving and get others excited about microlending.  It's so empowering to see that you can make a real difference in the life of another person.  Plus, you're not just making a donation - you're helping someone to make a viable living.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the Assistant Director of International Operations for a nonprofit that organizes service programs around the world.  I work with organizations and individuals in various communities to arrange the program logistics in order to get volunteers to communities where they serve with local people on local projects.  The picture is of me with some students at a summer language camp in Poland.

lenders.name: Patty
lenders.loan_because: I want to see all people be given a chance to be live their lives. They should be empowered by their hard work and be able to support their loved ones.

lenders.name: Axel
lenders.occupation: Policy advisor at French environment ministry
lenders.loan_because: we should all do the most good for the most people.
lenders.occupational_info: I study the flapping flight of pterodactyls - you know 'flying dinosaurs'.

lenders.name: Leah
lenders.occupation: Work with horses; breeding farm and rescues

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.occupational_info: I help women in Guatemala and Mexico start their businesses.

lenders.name: Maggie
lenders.occupational_info: I am a university student studying journalism.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: It's time to share some of the blessings that God has given me.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a secretary.

lenders.name: Cheri
lenders.loan_because: I want to see everyone happy and successful.

lenders.name: alan
lenders.occupational_info: i own a number of whole sale and retail butcher shops.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: it believe it is crucial to our lives to help our fellow man.  If I can help someone in any way, I feel better about my life!
lenders.occupational_info: I sell fresh Produce to food stores, we purchase these goods from California, Florida, Mexico, Spain and other growing areas.

lenders.name: Dan and Andrea
lenders.loan_because: folks just need a little help to make their dreams come true, and I can definitely provide a little help.

lenders.name: ANJU
lenders.loan_because:
It will make a differene in someone's
life !

lenders.name: Star
lenders.loan_because:
I believe that everyone has the desire to be self-sufficient and to provide a comfortable life for their family.  Sadly, often, that desire is just a dream.  

Although I find that most people are willing to work hard; they are not often provided the means to make that desire and dream a reality.  

I have always had people reach their hands out to me to help me make my dreams and desires real, so to be able to help make the dream of another a reality is a true blessing in my life.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a lawyer who for 6 years worked as a public prosecutor, in New York specializing in violent crimes.  I enjoyed protecting the rights of  victims and their families and also making sure that justice was done fairly for those accused of a crime.  

In 1992, I changed careers and began using my legal training as a television broadcaster.  Over the last 15 years, I have been a commentator, journalist, and an interviewer.  For the last 10 years, I have been a talk show host on a national level...and right now I host my own talk show on "TRU TV" (formerly Court TV) called the "Star Jones Show."  

The purpose of our show is to tell the stories of people who often have no voice in the areas of law, justice, entertainment and current events.

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: we all need some help now and then

lenders.name: Neda
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Le Brayon
lenders.loan_because: I loan on Kiva.org because I want to make a difference in people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a software developer. I do French and English freelance translation as well. I work from home.

lenders.name: Halvard
lenders.loan_because: I want to help

lenders.name: Janine
lenders.loan_because: everyone in every way can make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: I arrange business to business trade shows

lenders.name: Marc
lenders.loan_because: i am fortunate enough to be able to do so.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I help because I can and it makes me feel good.  Be the change you want to see in the world.

lenders.name: john
lenders.loan_because: my wife is khmer and i know how great the need is  for small loans in cambodia.  so please help!!!
lenders.occupational_info: legal work

lenders.name: Wayne
lenders.loan_because: it actually works

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others who are trying to build better lives for themselves and their families and to promote goodwill in the world community.  We're all in this together!

lenders.name: Duane
lenders.loan_because: My grandparents were immigrants that came to America after the second World War. They worked very hard to establish themselves in this country and enable their children and grandchildren to have great opportunities in life. When they passed away, I received a few thousand dollars from their estate. This money I've donated to Kiva so I can lend and relend it to many hardworking people around the world that are also looking to give their children as many opportunities as possible.

lenders.name: Paul D
lenders.loan_because: I feel I can make a difference; even as an artist with a very limited income.  Many of us are only a paycheck away from needing a loan such as this.  I feel that if I make a difference in someone else's life by giving them a chance, that my own life can only prosper in a multitude of ways!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a visual artist (sculpture and painting) and educator based in Seattle, WA.

lenders.name: Sarabou
lenders.loan_because: I want to give to the world what I get from the world.  Many people have helped me over the years. I'm just starting to give back now. There are so many wonderful people who just need a little bit of help to fly.
lenders.occupational_info:
I dream up large-scale events and write plays for children. 

Most importantly, I'm a mom to three beautiful, funny little kids.

lenders.name: Beth & J.R.
lenders.loan_because: every person deserves the opportunity to better themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a father and daughter lending team.  Dad enjoys investing in worthwhile causes, and Beth works for a non-profit striving to make people change the way they think about the world.

lenders.name: Joan
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping women and families around the world. I belong to Soroptimist, an international organization of business and professional women. We help women and families at home and throughout the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked with programs which helped children through difficult times.

lenders.name: wendell
lenders.loan_because: I want to help small business people who need the assistance.
lenders.occupational_info: We package and distribute food products to retail and institutional customers.

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: The history, purpose, mission,vision, and goals of Kiva impressed me greatly.  I believe it is a good way to truly help people who are trying to improve their lives and the situation in their country.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a life coach.  I help people set and achieve their business and personal goals by attacking, one by one, the obstacles that stand in their way.

lenders.name: Harald
lenders.loan_because: It is not a lot of money, but it can help a lot!

lenders.name: Kent
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lenders.name: CALEY
lenders.loan_because: The world gets better and every one keeps their dignity.
lenders.occupational_info: I design work spaces to be comfortable, safe and efficient.

lenders.name: Joakim
lenders.loan_because: I can and should
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a Manager in a resturant

lenders.name: Ethan
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I help distill the collective ideas and needs of groups into tangible, beautiful, lasting solutions.

lenders.name: francisco
lenders.loan_because: as a family we believe in giving back.

lenders.name: Nicola Ardigo
lenders.occupation: a citizen, a thinker, a human being
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of solidarity and that peace love and good are stronger than the evil.
lenders.occupational_info: I think the world is always in need of people doing the right thing.

lenders.name: Lou
lenders.loan_because: It's my small way of "paying it forward" and helping someone.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: A little can make a big difference in someone else's life.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I started my business in 2003 and my success has been in large part due to the generosity of others through coaching, interest and other selfless acts.  In a sense, this is my way of paying forward the kindness I have received from so many people that has been so critical to the growth of my own business.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a software development and consulting firm.  We specialize in Human Resource software; software that tracks address, salary and benefit enrollment for large companies around the world.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: My generous daughter gave me a KIVA gift certificate as a Holiday present.  I have, in turn, given the same wonderful gift to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach high school students with disabilities vocational skills.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I believe you get what you give
lenders.occupational_info: I buy houses, fix them up and resell them for a small profit.   I also invest in small businesses in my community.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: It's a satisfying thing to do...and I've got more than I need.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to protect natural areas across Southern Ontario, Canada.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.occupation: Retired public relations mgr & chemical engineer
lenders.loan_because: I wish to support the efforts of women everywhere to improve their families' standard of living.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate to have my own business for many years, and would like to help someone else do the same.

lenders.name: Bonnie
lenders.loan_because: I can help make someone's quality of life just a little bit better! Me considero una persona muy afortunada y ahora que tengo los medios para ayudar a otros, por que no?
lenders.occupational_info: Spanish Prof. Soy profesora, especializandome en literatura del siglo XVII.

lenders.name: Tami
lenders.loan_because: I love helping.

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: I want to help
lenders.occupational_info: interesting

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: I can share my good fortune with others...my small contribution can combine with others to create a real difference in someone else s life!

lenders.name: Thamar en Timo
lenders.loan_because: We are fortunate enough we can do so!
lenders.occupational_info: Timo is a logistics manager and Thamar is a lawyer

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: It is fun having that little bit of involvement in helping those who want to help themselves.

lenders.name: Chris Baggott
lenders.loan_because:
I understand entrepreneurship and what it can do to raise the living standard not only for the business person but the entire community.

I also understand the handicap of limited opportunity and want to do whatever i can to give people a chance to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a person who starts businesses.  Currently I'm on my third.   Mostly I'm proud that I've created nearly 500 jobs and at least 20 former employees I know of have gone on to start their own businesses.

lenders.name: Shelley
lenders.loan_because: It only makes sense.

lenders.name: MUSA Mad Mike
lenders.loan_because: I'm in a position to be able to help and having an entrepreneur spirit I like to see others succeed on their own as well.  Life is full of risks, but if you never take them you never really live.  Good luck to everyone!

lenders.name: Eduardo
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people.

lenders.name: Steph
lenders.loan_because: I have overcome many hardships in my life and know the importance of a helping hand and the difference it can make to someone's life.  I have had someone reach out that hand to me in the past and I worked hard and made us both proud.  I would like the opportunity now to pay it forward.

lenders.name: barbara
lenders.loan_because: to share the wealth

lenders.name: Charlie and Gretchen
lenders.loan_because: It is simply the right thing to do. Besides, who can pass up an opportunity to help someone in need?

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: Everybody deserves a chance to make life better for themselves and their family.
lenders.occupational_info: I operate the controls of the locomotive (train) to move freight from all over the world to different destinations within the United States

lenders.name: Daris,Azra&Almir
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Gregory
lenders.loan_because: this was a Christmas gift for my parents.
lenders.occupational_info: I help a group of family doctors develop new health promotion programs and then evaluate them to determine which programs work and why so we can help our patients become healthier.

lenders.name: Marci and Ian
lenders.loan_because: We like the idea of helping others to be self-sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info: We own a software company that automates expert knowledge. We are working on a Virtual Doctor to allow people with minimal training deliver health care in the developing world.

lenders.name: Nazia
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel all warm and fuzzy inside.

lenders.name: anne
lenders.loan_because: It helps me know that I am contributing to a larger family of the world and the Creator, thru the work of Kiva.  My prayers for encouragement reach out to each one.
lenders.occupational_info:
I was a school teacher, writer.
Believor in the Kingdom of God,
His love and mercy.

lenders.name: The Goughs
lenders.loan_because: It's exciting to see how lives can be changed.
lenders.occupational_info: Matt is a minister in a Presbyterian Church & Christine is currently home with the kids, but a teacher by trade.

lenders.name: Ainsley
lenders.loan_because: it's my own form of entrepreneurship.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with businesses in conflict zones to help them access new opportunity to create jobs and build a better tomorrow.

lenders.name: Don and Janice
lenders.loan_because: We want to help other people get the start they need to change their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: We tried to teach our children to love to continue to learn new and exciting things. Learning is a never ending process.

lenders.name: Vinodh
lenders.loan_because: I like the fact that I can decide where exactly my money goes to. I like helping 'the little (wo)man' directly instead of donating to an organization without knowing what they'll do with the money.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a statistical researcher at the national Dutch Statistics Office, a government-funded, non-profit organization.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I have been so fortunate, though I am undeserving.  I believe that microfinancing provides hope for those who would otherwise have little.  And now, through Kiva, being a part of the process is possible for the "little people."  I want to take advantage of this opportunity to give others the chance to better their lives and communities.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: My daughter Amy made this loan on my behave for a Christmas present.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a family run lumber company that buys untreated lumber. We kiln dry it and resell it to be used as hardwood flooring, furniture, and manufacturing.

lenders.name: Afi
lenders.loan_because: I believe in hard work and helping people, and I would want someone to do the same for me.

lenders.name: Dave & Beth
lenders.loan_because: We received a loan to start a business which made it much easier. This opportunity should be available to all entrepreneurs and Kiva makes it possible.
lenders.occupational_info:
We produce syrup by tapping white birch trees in much the same way as one would tap maple trees.
We tap the trees, collect the sap and boil it to condense sugar in the sap. Eventually it becomes sweet syrup to be used in baking and cooking or dripped on ice cream.

lenders.name: Barb
lenders.loan_because: Entrepreneurship is the cornerstone of creating self reliant, confident and independent people. People have been generous to me and now I'm in a position to be generous with others.
lenders.occupational_info: Retail Operations Services and Planning. Build and support retail strategy for multi unit operations.

lenders.name: Ann-Marie
lenders.loan_because: I believe that it is our responsibility to help others in need.  One small gesture can make a difference one person at a time.

lenders.name: Bart
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed and I would like to help others realize their dreams.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I believe we all should give back and help each other.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired animal lover.

lenders.name: Jerry
lenders.loan_because: We have so much to be thankful for, including the opportunity to make a difference in people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an artist, a painter and sculptor

lenders.name: Pasha
lenders.loan_because: "What does the L-RD require of you? Act Justly, Love Mercy, Walk Humbly with your G-D"  Micah 6:8
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people how to use their Mac computers with confidence.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on websites, publishing content and managing technology projects. I am also a volunteer editor for Kiva.

lenders.name: Teresa
lenders.loan_because: I've been a poor, homeless, single mom and only with education and help from many people am I able to be secure with a roof over my head, enough to eat, and to keep my family healthy.  I can't change the world, but I can try to change my little corner of it.
lenders.occupational_info: I help healthy people stay healthy and I help sick people take as good care of their health as possible.  I do this by giving them them information and tools to let them make informed healthcare decisions.

lenders.name: mike
lenders.loan_because: To make a long term difference in world poverty  there must be a sustainable free market  that provides self sufficiency and self esteem: "  give a man a fish, feed him for a day; teach a man to fish and feed him for a lifetime"
lenders.occupational_info: I sale building materials

lenders.name: Monica
lenders.loan_because: I want to share my blessings with others around the world.

lenders.name: Ashleigh
lenders.occupation: President of a small staffing company

lenders.loan_because: Sometimes a little help may go far, if everyone do their part.
lenders.occupational_info:
Electronic Engineer 
Federal Aviation  Administration

lenders.loan_because: I can and I understand.

lenders.occupation: former attorney/actuary- now stay at home mom

lenders.loan_because: My sister gave me this as a gift...a gift that will keep giving!

lenders.name: Cherie
lenders.loan_because: I am also a small business owner and know it can be a challenge.  I also want to support individuals who are less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: Provide health and wellness tips to others.

lenders.name: Adam Hudson
lenders.loan_because: We are so lucky to live where and how we do. We have more than we need. We love Kiva because its not just 'giving' its empowering. Very cool stuff!

lenders.name: Dorothy
lenders.loan_because: This is a wonderful opportunity to reach around the world and connect with an individual.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: ... if we all helped each other, what a great place this world would be.

lenders.name: Tara
lenders.loan_because:
Unless someone like you cares a whole awful lot, nothing is going to get better.  It's not. 
~Dr. Seuss

lenders.name: amelia for HSL Docs Team
lenders.loan_because: I love giving people the chance to better themselves.

lenders.occupational_info: I retired as an accounting Supervisor

lenders.occupational_info: You can look at my work from anywhere in the world.

lenders.name: Sali

lenders.name: Kathleen

lenders.occupational_info: I build inground swimming pools for people's homes

lenders.loan_because: I think it's way more effective than big "aid" organizations in promoting real social progress

lenders.name: Art
lenders.loan_because: I can, we should, and, its "The Right Thing To Do".
lenders.occupational_info: Making the world aware that Americans are really compassionate, caring people that want to help those that need a helping hand.

lenders.name: Karen

lenders.occupational_info: I prepare yearly tax returns for individuals and business.

lenders.name: GreenBean

lenders.occupational_info: I work with amazing creative and technology professionals in the production of visual media.

lenders.occupational_info: Heart Press - Best in Women's Fiction

lenders.name: Andre

lenders.name: Carole

lenders.occupational_info: I find finance, human resources, development, and operations executives for companies and nonprofit organizations.

lenders.name: Dusty
lenders.loan_because: I started in sales at a very young age and before I could get started I needed a loan to do so. I had no credit and no one to co-sign for me. I finally found an Institution that was willing to take me as a risk. Today I am finacially sound and I owe it all to somemone who had a little bit of faith in me. Everyone deserves a chance to be successful. Hard work and faith will make any business thrive.

lenders.name: Lee
lenders.loan_because: I think this is an excellent idea!
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that makes heating and cooling equipment for buildings.

lenders.name: John & Catherine

lenders.name: john
lenders.loan_because: it matters
lenders.occupational_info:
theparadigmproject's mission is to support and advance positive social, environmental, economic and cultural transformation through market and community based innovation, implementation, empowerment and restorative development.

paradigmdevelopment is an eco development and service company providing sustainable solutions through green building services, consulting, home assessments, green ratings, home energy performance testing and the intelligent production of new and remodeled green homes.

Cenergie (www.cenergie.com) makes zero-emission, high efficiency, mass manufacturable Alkaline Fuel Cells (AFC) that are silent, low temperature, quick-start, flexible, recyclable, reliable and directly price competitive with conventional energy production. 

Our mission is to bring fuel cell technology to the mass market, accelerate the development of a Clean Hydrogen Economy, and enable the supply of clean affordable power to all.

When combined with our Total Utility Solution (TUS) Waste-to-Energy system they can provide a lower cost per kWh. Our primary markets are stationary, distributed generation, mobile and marine fleet applications and we are working toward a number of Clean H2 solutions with solar, wind, tidal, electrolysis, landfill methane reformation, waste gasification, algeal and other partner technologies.
